text: Bryan William Yuile was born 29 October, 1941 in Palmerston North. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played 17 tests for New Zealand and also played for Central Districts in Plunket Shield. He, Bruce Murray and Vic Pollard were objected to playing cricket on Sundays. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:People from Palmerston North
title: Bryan Yuile
